title: Waiting for Deborah
description: Would he ever love her?A waif in need of his care. . .That was obviously how dynamic consultant Sir James Marlow saw Deborah. Otherwise why would he bother to keep rescuing her? Deborah knew it couldn't be because of her looks -- she had carrot-colored hair and no figure to speak of. That was the only explanation she could come up with -- unless he wanted something else from her altogether.
author: Betty Neels
